title: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in packages view works fine.
EB: When searching for declarations via Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Open the search dialog. 
4. Enter a search query for declarations. 
5. Perform the search. 
6. Observe that no results are displayed. 

Note: Searching via the context menu in packages view works fine.
